revised_title: The Pupil-Photometer: A Measure of Light Intensity
tldr: The Pupil-Photometer is an instrument that measures the size of the pupil, which is found to be reciprocally related to the intensity of light. The device can be used to test light of different intensities and determine the candle-power of a luminous source. The study also reveals that the pupil has a range of its own in different individuals, but the ratios of the pupil's size to light intensity remain consistent.
